column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Was very busy but the service was outstanding and the food amazing as last time! Got our must haves of Brussels Sprout Salad
column2: The Goat Cheese baked in tomato sauce with garlic bread and Sangria. This time we tried the Fried Calamari which came with a spicy aioli which was excellent. We really liked the Sweet Potato Soup but it was a very small portion and could have eaten more. We did not care for the Chickpea Stew
column3: filled with a lot of corn. Ended with a delicious chocolate truffle. Satisfaction.
